content:
<rule id="3rd-party-30100" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="sentinel-{*}" groupId="com.alibaba.csp"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-alibaba-sentinel-{*}" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-starter-alibaba-sentinel" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-circuitbreaker-sentinel" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Sentinel">
                    <description>The application embeds the Sentinel framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Sentinel</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
